title: Puerto Rico earthquake: Punta Ventana collapses as powerful tremor hits
description: Punta Ventana, a well-known rock formation, collapses as a 5.8-magnitude earthquake strikes.

title: Arteta 'shouted a lot' at half-time as Arsenal shrug off sluggish start to beat Leeds
description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta shouted at his players at half-time to inspire an improved performance as they beat Leeds in the FA Cup.

description: Watch highlights as Reiss Nelson's second-half goal ensures Arsenal come through a tough test at home to Championship side Leeds United in the FA Cup third round.

title: Love Island: Lewis Capaldi's ex and Rochelle Humes' sister among line-up

title: Reynhard Sinaga: How the Manchester rapist found his victims
description: For several years, until he was caught in 2017, Reynhard Sinaga preyed on young men enjoying a night out.

title: Russian fishermen pull cars from icy sea
description: The parked cars were stuck two metres deep after the ice beneath them cracked.

title: Reynhard Sinaga: Britain's 'most prolific rapist' jailed for life
description: A man convicted of 159 sex offences can be identified for the first time after the end of his latest trial.

description: Sam Mendes and Olivia Colman win awards at an event where Australia's bushfires were often mentioned.

title: New car registrations at lowest level since 2013
description: It is the third consecutive year of decline, driven by weak confidence and confusion over new rules.

title: Qasem Soleimani: Boris Johnson and European leaders call for restraint
description: Boris Johnson joins Angela Merkel and Emmanuel Macron in urging calm amid Gulf crisis.

title: Taylor breaks NZ batting record but Australia wrap up 3-0 series win
description: Ross Taylor becomes New Zealand's leading Test run scorer but Australia won the third Test in Sydney by 279 runs to complete a 3-0 series victory.

title: Australia legend Warne auctions Test cap for bushfire appeal
description: Australian cricket great Shane Warne is set to raise more than 300,000 Australian dollars (£160,000) for the bushfire appeal after deciding to auction his prized 'baggy green' Test cap.

title: Crowe sends climate message to Golden Globes
description: The actor used his speech to say a "climate change-based" crisis was unfolding in Australia.

title: British stars won big in film and TV at the Golden Globes

title: Why Beckford wants another Leeds FA Cup shock - 10 years on

title: Golden Globes 2020: Ricky Gervais's best jokes and other highlights
description: Ricky Gervais pulled no punches in his opening monologue at the Golden Globe Awards.

title: Webb unlikely to play again for Toulon because of 'dishonest attitude'
description: Rhys Webb may have made his final Toulon appearance after the club's majority owner claimed a "dishonest attitude" regarding his move back to Wales.

description: Monday's papers report Boris Johnson's response to the US strike on an Iranian army chief.

title: CES 2020: The Russian car with no driver at the wheel
